markups.content: 直接使用一个image net训练的作为预先训练模型，然后每个block 试过一个 K 池化拉出特征图，以此利用多尺度信息
markups.title: 编码器结构

markups.originaltext: We generate a condi-tional vector cki using a 2D form of conventional positionalencoding (PE) [39]. Each cki ∈ RCk contains sin and cosharmonics that are unique to its spatial location (hk, wk)i.We extend unconditional flow framework to CFLOW byconcatenating the intermediate vectors inside decoder cou-pling layers with the conditional vectors ci as in [2].

textblocks.text:
We generate a condi-
tional vector cki using a 2D form of conventional positional
encoding (PE) [39]. Each cki ∈ RCk contains sin and cos
harmonics that are unique to its spatial location (hk, wk)i.
We extend unconditional flow framework to CFLOW by
concatenating the intermediate vectors inside decoder cou-
pling layers with the conditional vectors ci as in [2].

markups.originaltext: 这里讲了PE 模块，其实就是脱胎于 all you need is attention中PE。具体解析见md

title: CFLOW-AD Real-Time Unsupervised Anomaly Detection with Localization via Conditional Normalizing Flows_2021
